root.name: Enemy Engaged: Apache/Havoc
root.description: After the release of the sequel, Comanche vs Hokum, a patch was issued that allowed multiplayer between the two games, owners of both could also import the helicopters and scenarios from Apache vs Havoc into Comanche vs Hokum.There are three scenarios included in the game, set in Thailand, Cuba and Georgia, and each campaign evolves dynamically as AI commanders on both sides assign mission objectives and react to the other sides' moves. The player can also switch to commander mode, where they can assign mission objectives and troop movements themselves, and pilot any Havoc or Apache helicopters on the field.
